body: You can do `make install HAS_SYSTEM_PROTOBUF=false`. This seems like you need the latest version of protobuf installed on your system however.

Yes, I have tried this. And yes I do have the latest version installed.

Im running into so many issues I must admit I am getting confused and losing tack.

I have the same issue on Fedora 25:

```
gcc --version
gcc (GCC) 7.1.1 20170622 (Red Hat 7.1.1-3)
```

```
protoc --version
libprotoc 3.2.0
```


```
make -j8                                                                                                                                                                          <<<
[MAKE]    Generating cache.mk
[C]       Compiling src/core/ext/transport/cronet/transport/cronet_transport.c
[HOSTCXX] Compiling src/compiler/php_generator.cc
src/core/ext/transport/cronet/transport/cronet_transport.c: In function ‘create_grpc_frame’:
src/core/ext/transport/cronet/transport/cronet_transport.c:653:10: warning: conversion to ‘uint8_t {aka unsigned char}’ from ‘int’ may alter its value [-Wconversion]
   *p++ = (flags & GRPC_WRITE_INTERNAL_COMPRESS) ? 1 : 0;
          ^
[AR]      Creating /home/julianoes/src/grpc/libs/opt/libgrpc_cronet.a
[LD]      Linking /home/julianoes/src/grpc/libs/opt/libgrpc_cronet.so.4.0.0
In file included from src/compiler/php_generator.cc:23:0:
./src/compiler/php_generator_helpers.h: In function ‘grpc::string grpc_php_generator::GetPHPServiceFilename(const FileDescriptor*, const ServiceDescriptor*, const string&)’:
./src/compiler/php_generator_helpers.h:51:23: error: ‘const class google::protobuf::FileOptions’ has no member named ‘has_php_namespace’; did you mean ‘has_csharp_namespace’?
   if (file->options().has_php_namespace()) {
                       ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
                       has_csharp_namespace
./src/compiler/php_generator_helpers.h:52:39: error: ‘const class google::protobuf::FileOptions’ has no member named ‘php_namespace’; did you mean ‘csharp_namespace’?
     oss << ReplaceAll(file->options().php_namespace(), "\\", "/");
                                       ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
                                       csharp_namespace
src/compiler/php_generator.cc: In function ‘grpc::string grpc_php_generator::GenerateFile(const FileDescriptor*, const ServiceDescriptor*, const string&)’:
src/compiler/php_generator.cc:153:25: error: ‘const class google::protobuf::FileOptions’ has no member named ‘has_php_namespace’; did you mean ‘has_csharp_namespace’?
     if (file->options().has_php_namespace()) {
                         ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
                         has_csharp_namespace
src/compiler/php_generator.cc:154:39: error: ‘const class google::protobuf::FileOptions’ has no member named ‘php_namespace’; did you mean ‘csharp_namespace’?
       php_namespace = file->options().php_namespace();
                                       ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
                                       csharp_namespace
make: *** [Makefile:2527: /home/julianoes/src/grpc/objs/opt/src/compiler/php_generator.o] Error 1
```

To get this far, I had to disable `-Werror` because of `-Wconversion` and `-Wimplicit-fallthrough`.

This is on v1.6.x.

The same happens in Ubuntu 16.04 in docker
```
In file included from src/compiler/php_generator.cc:23:0:
./src/compiler/php_generator_helpers.h: In function 'grpc::string grpc_php_generator::GetPHPServiceFilename(const FileDescriptor*, const ServiceDescriptor*, const string&)':
./src/compiler/php_generator_helpers.h:51:23: error: 'const class google::protobuf::FileOptions' has no member named 'has_php_namespace'
   if (file->options().has_php_namespace()) {
                       ^
./src/compiler/php_generator_helpers.h:52:39: error: 'const class google::protobuf::FileOptions' has no member named 'php_namespace'
     oss << ReplaceAll(file->options().php_namespace(), "\\", "/");
                                       ^
src/compiler/php_generator.cc: In function 'grpc::string grpc_php_generator::GenerateFile(const FileDescriptor*, const ServiceDescriptor*, const string&)':
src/compiler/php_generator.cc:153:25: error: 'const class google::protobuf::FileOptions' has no member named 'has_php_namespace'
     if (file->options().has_php_namespace()) {
                         ^
src/compiler/php_generator.cc:154:39: error: 'const class google::protobuf::FileOptions' has no member named 'php_namespace'
       php_namespace = file->options().php_namespace();
                                       ^
Makefile:2525: recipe for target '/grpc/objs/opt/src/compiler/php_generator.o' failed
make: *** [/grpc/objs/opt/src/compiler/php_generator.o] Error 1
make: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
```

protobuf taken from https://launchpad.net/~maarten-fonville/+archive/ubuntu/protobuf/+packages?field.name_filter=&field.status_filter=published&field.series_filter=xenial.
This seems to be the same error as #12316.

This can be fixed using suggestion from #12316:
```
make HAS_SYSTEM_PROTOBUF=false
```
